title: Chinese Medicine groups
description: Meet other local people interested in chinese medicine: share experiences, inspire and encourage each other! Join a chinese medicine group.
cleaned_text: Chinese Medicine Meet other local people who are interested in Traditional Chinese Medicine. Discuss the efficacy of this ancient art, including ancillary topics of herbal remedies.
